import React from 'react' import Popup from 'reactjs-popup'; import './Schedule.css' export default function ScheduleItem({ schedule, deleteSchedule }) { function handleDelete() { deleteSchedule(schedule.id) } return (

{schedule.pickup}

{schedule.vehicle}

Delete} modal nested className={'modal'}>

This will be permanently deleted, are you sure?
) }
